duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee project document coordination and administration, ensuring on-time and accurate submittals, and construction close out.
Manage invoice tracker report, order construction drawings and documents, and collaborate with Project Managers and Purchasing Managers on construction plans.
Register and maintain all Contractor licenses, generate inspection documents and reports, and upload onsite inspection documents to AHV Sharepoint.
Distribute stamped permit sets to local field staff, validate and track acceptance.
